CustomField.formula: IF( Workflow__c = "ICO Workflow - 6" || Workflow__c = "ICO Workflow - 5", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( LOWER(Account__r.IFv2_ItemText__c) , "a" , ""), "b" , ""), "c" , ""), "d" , ""), "e" , ""), "f" , ""), "g" , ""), "h" , ""), "i" , ""), "j" , ""), "k" , ""), "l" , ""), "m" , ""), "n" , ""), "o" , ""), "p" , ""), "q" , ""), "r" , ""), "s" , ""), "t" , ""), "u" , ""), "v" , ""), "w" , ""), "x" , ""), "y" , ""), "z" , ""), " ", ""), ",",""), '')
CustomField.label: Invoice Item Amount (EUR)
